resources.string: You passed at school the most part of this questions

string-array.name: schoolQuestion1

resources.string: Facts you probably didn\'t know, about things that you know

string-array.name: didyouknowQuestion1

string-array.name: didyouknowQuestion2
string-array.item: Which word is translated as “the man of the desert”?
They mostly live in North Africa.

string-array.name: didyouknowQuestion3
string-array.item: What did Fridtjof Nansen use to get from the eastern shore of Greenland to the western?
They can be mountain, walking and water.
Facilities that increase area of fulcrum and make the movement on snowy, marshy and water surfaces easier.
